mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, WORKATTRIBUTEID, WORKMOULDID, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, OPERTIME, FLAG, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, STATUS, PROTOCOLTIME1, PROTOCOLTIME2, ALERTFLAG, FILEURL, TITLE, WORKMOULD, WORK1, WORK2, WORK3, WORK4, WORK5, WORK6, WARMOPER, CONTENT, UPDATEFLAG from db_workreport where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SEQUENCEID, WORKATTRIBUTEID, WORKMOULDID, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, OPERTIME, FLAG, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, STATUS, PROTOCOLTIME1, PROTOCOLTIME2, ALERTFLAG, FILEURL, TITLE, WORKMOULD, WORK1, WORK2, WORK3, WORK4, WORK5, WORK6, WARMOPER, CONTENT, UPDATEFLAG from db_workreport
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , WORKATTRIBUTEID , WORKMOULDID , CREATEOPER , CREATETIME , OPERTIME , FLAG , CORPID , OPENFLAG , OPER , STATUS , PROTOCOLTIME1 , PROTOCOLTIME2 , ALERTFLAG , FILEURL , TITLE , WORKMOULD , WORK1 , WORK2 , WORK3 , WORK4 , WORK5 , WORK6 , WARMOPER , CONTENT , UPDATEFLAG

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
WORKATTRIBUTEID = #{workattributeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
WORKMOULDID = #{workmouldid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PROTOCOLTIME1 = #{protocoltime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PROTOCOLTIME2 = #{protocoltime2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ALERTFLAG = #{alertflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FILEURL = #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
WORKMOULD = #{workmould,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
WORK1 = #{work1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
WORK2 = #{work2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
WORK3 = #{work3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
WORK4 = #{work4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
WORK5 = #{work5,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
WORK6 = #{work6,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
WARMOPER = #{warmoper,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
UPDATEFLAG = #{updateflag,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
